# BrowserEngineKit updates

**Article**

Learn about important changes in BrowserEngineKit.

## Overview

Browse notable changes in [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit].

## June 2025

### Text selection views

Implement text selection in the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/BETextInput] protocol by using a view below the text with [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/BETextInput/selectionContainerViewBelowText] or a view above the text with [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/BETextInput/selectionContainerViewAboveText]. As optional properties, you can leave the views unspecified and implement text selection using a subview of [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/BETextInput/textInputView].

### Extension management

Create XPC connections for an extension process with the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/BEExtensionProcess] protocol [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/BEExtensionProcess/makeLibXPCConnectionError()] method. Stop an extension process with [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/BEExtensionProcess/invalidate()].

### Interprocess rendering

Render over raw mach messaging using the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/LayerHierarchyHandle] methods, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/LayerHierarchyHandle/init(port:data:)] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/LayerHierarchyHandle/encode(_:)]. Similarly for [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/LayerHierarchyHostingTransactionCoordinator], use the methods, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/LayerHierarchyHostingTransactionCoordinator/init(port:data:)] and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BrowserEngineKit/LayerHierarchyHostingTransactionCoordinator/encode(_:)].

## Technology updates

- **Accelerate updates**: Learn about important changes to Accelerate.

- **AppleMapsServerAPI Updates**: Learn about important changes to AppleMapsServerAPI.
- **Apple Pencil updates**: Learn about important changes to Apple Pencil.
